questions.question: When a TREND is included at the end of a METAR, the trend is a forecast valid for:
options: a. 1 hour after the time of observation
b. 2 hours after the time of observation
c. 2 hours after it was issued
d. 1 hour after it was issued

questions.question: A METAR may be defined as being:
options: a. a routine weather report for a large area
b. an aerodrome forecast containing a TREND for the next 2 hours
c. a routine weather report concerning a specific aerodrome
d. a forecast weather report concerning a specific aerodrome

questions.question: You are given the following METAR, but the cloud group has been omitted: METAR: 28005KT 9999 12/11 Q1020 NOSIG. Using the rule of thumb that the cloud base in feet AGL is approximately (Temperature – Dew Point) × 400, at what height would you expect the cloud base to be?
options: a. SCT042
b. OVC090
c. SCT280
d. OVC005

questions.question:
Which of the following correctly decodes the METAR shown below?
METAR EGKL 130350Z 32005KT 0400N DZ BCFG VV002
options: a. Observed on the 13th day of the month at 0350Z, surface wind $320^{\circ}$ True, 05 kt, minimum visibility 400 metres to the north, moderate drizzle, with fog patches and a vertical visibility of 200 ft

b. Reported on the 13th day of the month at 0350Z, surface wind $320^{\circ}$ magnetic, 05 kt, minimum visibility 400 metres to the north, moderate drizzle, with fog patches and a vertical visibility of 200 ft
c. Valid on the 13th day of the month between 0300 and 1500Z, surface wind $320^{\circ}T/05$ kt, minimum visibility 400 metres, drizzle, with fog patches and a vertical visibility of 200 ft
d. Valid between 1300 and 1350Z, surface wind $320^{\circ}T/05$ kt, minimum visibility 400 metres to the north, moderate drizzle, with fog patches and a vertical visibility of 200 ft

questions.question: A temperature group of $28/24$ in a METAR means that:
options: a. the temperature is $28^{\circ}C$ at the time of reporting, but it is expected to become $24^{\circ}C$ by the end of the TREND report
b. the dry bulb is $28^{\circ}C$ and the wet bulb temperature is $24^{\circ}C$
c. the dew point is $28^{\circ}C$ and the temperature is $24^{\circ}C$
d. the temperature is $28^{\circ}C$ and the dew point is $24^{\circ}C$

questions.question: Providing the minimum sector altitude is not a factor, CAVOK in a TAF or METAR:
options: a. means visibility 10 km or more, and no cloud below 5000 ft
b. means visibility 10 km or more, and few cloud below 5000 ft
c. means visibility 10 nm or more, and no cloud below 5000 ft
d. means visibility 10 nm or more, and no scattered cloud below 5000 ft

questions.question: The visibility group R20/0050 in a METAR means:
options: a. as measured by runway measuring equipment for runway 20, a current visibility of 50 metres
b. for runway 20, a current visibility of 500 metres measured by runway visual range equipment
c. the runway visibility reported is 50 metres as measured by runway visual range equipment in the last 20 minutes
d. on runway 20 the current viability is less than 5000 metres

questions.question: The code "BECMG FM 1100-RASH" in a METAR means:
options: a. from 1100UTC, the cessation of rain showers
b. becoming from 1100UTC slight rain showers
c. becoming from 1100UTC rain showers
d. becoming from 1100UTC till 0000UTC slight rain showers
